Posts.Content: Oct 8, 2008 01:59PM Cparkinson wrote: hello all, This seems to be a very supportive and positive place to chat-----glad to have found you all. I know about the waiting, I went through that about 5 years ago. I had a lump in the right breast, but it was also very painful; so they could not test me for a bit. It was so tough to NOT know, and to keep trying to live a normal life until you find out! I was fortunate in that it was a blocked milk duct only, and that may be the case for you. I think it is very important to take good care of your diet and nutrition, get enough sleep and all that------not easy of course. I think a good B complex vitamin for stress, and I found this new product called "Holy Basil" was invaluable during that time and since.It is made by New Chapter company, and it is totally natural-----based on an old ayurvedic tradition. blue cross blue shield of north carolina
Posts.Title: paralyzed with fear itsmevalerie itsmevalerie
